python is 
- oop lang
-scripting lang
-procedure oriented, has functions
4 properties of oop
inheritance
poymorphism
abstraction
encapsulation
    abstraction & encapsulation less importance, not used much
    inheritance & polymorphism used most
has lots of benifits

Class , object and reference    -python operations

class is kind of blueprint

every class has "__doc__" string
it is the first statement in class, it can be used in methid function
- it descibes the class in short

Syntax of class
try to keep first letter of the class nma euppercase

class <className>:

class First:
    '''This is the doc string'''

if you hover on class name you can see the doc string, thats how it will show the class
